game.name: 3DMark
game.categories: Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Leaderboards
game.shortDescription: 3DMark는 하드웨어의 성능을 더욱 더 활용하고자 하는 게이머, 오버클럭 사용자, 시스템 제작자를 위한 프로그램입니다. 다양한 벤치마크 테스트와 더불어, 3DMark는 PC 성능 테스트를 위한 모든 도구를 갖추고 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: 3DMark is for gamers, overclockers and system builders who want to get more out of their hardware. With its wide range of benchmark tests, 3DMark has everything you need to test your PC or Mac's performance.

reviewHighlights.text: It's a good benchmarking tool. I don't have multiple systems to run through it, so it doesn't get used often. But, the devs keep it updated still afte...
3DMark is a game where your PC plays, you watch, and the real final boss is realizing your score is “below average.”
